text: Glendora is an unincorporated community and census-designated place (CDP) located within Gloucester Township, in Camden County, New Jersey, United States.State of New Jersey Census Designated Places - BVP20 - Data as of January 1, 2020, United States Census Bureau. Accessed December 1, 2022. As of the 2020 Census, the CDP's population was 4,784. == References == Category:Unincorporated communities in New Jersey Category:Census-designated places in New Jersey Category:Camden County, New Jersey
title: Glendora, New Jersey
